headline: Judge again blocks Ohio law regulating aborted fetal remains
author: Associated Press
sentences: It was the second time in a year that Hamilton County Common Pleas Judge Alison Hatheway prevented the law from taking effect, in a case brought by a group of clinics and the ACLU of Ohio.
COLUMBUS â€” A judge again blocked an Ohio law Wednesday that would require fetal remains from surgical abortions to be cremated or buried.
